biography: Philippe Candeloro (born 17 February 1972) is a French former competitive figure skater. He is a two-time Olympic bronze medalist (1994, 1998), a two-time World medalist (1994 silver, 1995 bronze), a two-time European silver medalist (1993, 1997), and a four-time French national champion (1994â€“97). He has been a commentator for French television during figure skating events at the Olympics. He also made special appearance as himself and a villian's victim named "Frozer" in Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir.
name: Philippe Candeloro
